    V

    View - Interface in task02
    The View interface defines the methods that must be implemented by any class responsible for displaying and interacting with the view of the application.
    Viewable - Interface in task02
    The Viewable interface defines the contract for any class that provides a view.
    ViewableResult - Class in task02
    The ViewableResult class implements the Viewable interface and provides an implementation for the getView method, which returns a ViewResult object.
    ViewableResult() - Constructor for class task02.ViewableResult
     
    ViewableTable - Class in task03
    The ViewableTable class extends ViewableResult and provides a method to retrieve a ViewTable instance.
    ViewableTable() - Constructor for class task03.ViewableTable
     
    viewCalculate() - Method in interface task02.View
    Performs calculations for the data displayed in the view.
    viewCalculate() - Method in class task02.ViewResult
    Performs numerical conversions on all stored calculation data objects.
    ViewConsoleCommand - Class in task04
    The ViewConsoleCommand class implements the ConsoleCommand interface and represents a console command for displaying the current data.
    ViewConsoleCommand(View) - Constructor for class task04.ViewConsoleCommand
    Constructs a ViewConsoleCommand object with the specified view.
    viewInit() - Method in interface task02.View
    Initializes the view with necessary data or configurations.
    viewInit() - Method in class task02.ViewResult
    Initializes the view by generating new random calculation data objects.
    viewInit() - Method in class task03.ViewTable
    Initializes the view, preparing the data for display.
    viewInit(int) - Method in class task03.ViewTable
    Initializes the view with the specified column width.
    viewRestore() - Method in interface task02.View
    Restores the state of the view from a file or storage medium.
    viewRestore() - Method in class task02.ViewResult
    Restores the list of calculation data objects from a serialized file.
    ViewResult - Class in task02
    The ViewResult class implements the View interface and provides functionality for initializing, calculating, saving, restoring, and displaying numerical conversion results.
    ViewResult() - Constructor for class task02.ViewResult
    Constructs a ViewResult object with the default number of elements.
    ViewResult(int) - Constructor for class task02.ViewResult
    Constructs a ViewResult object with a specified number of elements.
    viewSave() - Method in interface task02.View
    Saves the current state of the view to a file or storage medium.
    viewSave() - Method in class task02.ViewResult
    Saves the current list of calculation data objects to a file via serialization.
    ViewTable - Class in task03
    The ViewTable class extends ViewResult and provides functionality to display the results of calculations in a table format.
    ViewTable() - Constructor for class task03.ViewTable
    Constructs a ViewTable instance with the default width.
    ViewTable(int) - Constructor for class task03.ViewTable
    Constructs a ViewTable instance with a specified width.
    ViewTable(int, int) - Constructor for class task03.ViewTable
    Constructs a ViewTable instance with a specified width and the number of items to display.
